department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 藥物輸送技術的研究發展在生醫工程領域中佔有非常重要的地位。本門課的開設目的，是希望透過適當的課程設計幫助學生綜觀了解藥物輸送的原理與方法。其內容除了涵蓋(基礎)分子/細胞生物學，生物化學，以及工程數學等科學知識以外，同時還會對於現今生物/製藥產業之概況作一介紹。藉此期待學生除了認識基本藥物輸送學理之外，對於最新的生醫技術發展及其臨床上之應用也有一定程度的認識
goal.en: “To understand and study the principles, theories, methodologies, and applications of drug delivery systems.“

outline.ch:
109/10Introduction
209/17OFF
309/24Overview of Drug Delivery Systems
410/01Pulmonary Drug Delivery
510/08Transdermal Drug Delivery
610/15Gene Delivery
710/22Drug Delivery across Brain-Blood-Barrier
810/29Midterm Exam
911/05Diffusion and Drug Dispersion
1011/12Diffusion in Biological Systems (I)
1111/19Diffusion in Biological Systems (II)
1211/26Drug Permeation through Biological Barriers
1312/03Drug Transport by Fluid Motion
1412/10Final Presentation
1512/17Final Presentation
1612/24Final Exam
1712/31Receptor-Mediated Drug Delivery
1801/07/2025Emerging Nanomedicine for Cancer Therapy

textbook.ch:
1.W. Mark Saltzman. Drug Delivery, Engineering Principles for Drug Therapy. 2001. Oxford.
2.Kewal K. Jain. Drug Delivery Systems. 1st edition, 2008. Humana Press.
3.Binghe Wang, Teruna Siahaan, and Richard A. Soltero. Drug Delivery Principles and Applications. 2005. Wiley.
textbook.en:
1.W. Mark Saltzman. Drug Delivery, Engineering Principles for Drug Therapy. 2001. Oxford.
2.Kewal K. Jain. Drug Delivery Systems. 1st edition, 2008. Humana Press.
3.Binghe Wang, Teruna Siahaan, and Richard A. Soltero. Drug Delivery Principles and Applications. 2005. Wiley.

講授
研討

(3) Final Presentation: 30％     (4) Attendance: 10％“
gradMethod.en:

ch.competencies: 醫學工程與臨床問題締合

en.competencies: Combination of medical engineering and clinic problems

ch: 系所:限生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班、生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程博士班。
系所:限非生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班、非生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程博士班。
en: Department:Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering、Ph.D. Program of Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering only.

Department:Non-Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering、Non-Ph.D. Program of Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering only.
